animeTitle: K: Seven Stories Movie 1 - R:B - Blaze
animeDescription: Lately, the stress of having to constantly keep his destructive power under control is causing the Red King Mikoto Suoh to become unstable. Meanwhile, Reisi Munakata is chosen by the Dresden Slate to become the new Blue King.(Source: TubiTV)
